website_summaries.verdict: Nintendo Land's varied attractions offer plenty of family-friendly fun and make great use of the Wii U's capabilities.
pros: Fun single-player attractions make good use of the Wii U tabletPlenty of enjoyable ways to play with friends cooperatively and competitivelyMario Chase is a terrific twist on hide-and-seekNintendo themes give the attractions some charm
cons: A few attractions are too difficult or too shallow

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my 9 year old nephew as a 'chores reward' prize after a summer full of helping out with daily duties and watching his little cousin. He loves it! I played a few of the games this evening and it was pretty fun! There are a lot of different games to choose from. My only 'con' would be that a lot of them are 2+ player games. Since he is often playing by himself, he had to wait for someone to be free long enough to be able to play those specific games. I would recommend this for any Nintendo lover.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. I wanted games to play with my family, like team games. I am 50 years old and recently purchased a Wii U. This has many mini-games to play as teams with your family or solo play. Depending on the attraction, players can play solo, compete against other players, or even team up to play as a team. When using the Game Pad it brings another experience to the game. You can play with up to five players. There are also multi-player modes. You may need to buy additional accessories for multi-player mode. My daughters are 20 and 22 and want to have game days now. Great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: CP777

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Land really a surprise gem!
customer_reviews.text: If you own a WiiU, this is a fantastic fun family game! My kids and I just love it! I like that up to 5 can play at the same time! It also uses the WiiU game pad in unique ways. Really a gem! I hope Nintendo comes out with version 2 and adds new games and options and more cool uses for the game pad, too. We love to play as our Mii characters in the game and have friends and family come over and play as their Mii. Even grandma! In my humble opinion, Wii Resort and WiiU Nintendo Land are the best games we've found so far that kids and adults can play and enjoy together!
customer_reviews.author: Kri Perry

customer_reviews.title: It might help to just take a pic of the product instead of taking one off of the internet.
customer_reviews.text: I thought when I ordered it I would receive what I saw in the pic. The game didn't come in the original packaging as shown but instead a cd case. Just not what I want as a video game collector. Very fast shipping though and they've already approved my refund so for that I'll give you 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon merkamp

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Was hanging with the guys, just trying to get right into the action. AND WAS INTERRUPTED BY THAT GOSH DANGED ROBOT WHO INSISTED ON GIVING ME, AND MY GROUP OF FRIENDS, AN INFURIATINGLY LONG TUTORIAL ON BASIC ARBITRARY NONSENSE. However my love for nintendo and the quality bargain that is this game, I will still give it 5 stars. Just be advised in advance, do not first-time-start this game in front of people. It is worse than playstation with the time it will consume with waiting.
customer_reviews.author: littledog

customer_reviews.title: Five-Star Game, Four-Star Packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful game! I played the game at some Nintendo-sponsored events and at a friend's house, so I bought it soon after. It's a great game, both in single-player and multiplayer, although it's much more fun with friends over. I'll go ahead and give it five stars - I was going to give it four stars because while the packaging was new and unwrapped, the cover looked very faded, like it had been in the sun for a while. Otherwise, get your hands on this, it's a wonderful game.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this game! Lots of games to choose from, no swearing, no blood, no real violence. If you are looking for a game the whole family can enjoy, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Not sleepy

customer_reviews.title: Great children's party game!
customer_reviews.text: It is fun if you have kids. It is a decent beginner level video game. The games mix up the play styles a lot around the system's unique control scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, fun
customer_reviews.text: I was already expecting this game to be pretty fun, but when I actually started playing it I was actually quite impressed. It's not JUST a collection of mini-games. It really is like a little amusement park for your Mii to walk through (your Mii's will look fantastic in this game btw). And each mini-game has multiple levels, so really you're not just playing it once, but many many times. Highly recommend this for anyone who has a Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: tw4

customer_reviews.title: My family can't stop playing this one
customer_reviews.text: My kids age 4-12 play this game a lot, they love that it can be enjoyed by people of varying skill. My wife and I will occasionally jump in and we love the ability to just pick up and play without needing to know a bunch of control schemes...it is simple. My only complaint is the volume level that my living room gets to when 4 or 5 of them are playing at one time! At least they are sounds of joy as they play and have fun together.
customer_reviews.author: The Youngs

customer_reviews.title: HELP:  2 Player Mode
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son just got the NintendoLand game for Wii U. We are having a hard time being able to play 2 players at the same time. It says that the remotes need to be set up in the main menu but when we try to set up the ProController, it won't work. We go through the process of syncing the controller at the main Wii U home menu/ His gamepad is the only controller that can be used. Can a ProController not work on this game for a second player. And if so, what other controller do I need for a second player, nunchuck, or a wand, or a remote. I'm so confused!
customer_reviews.author: Trey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wii motes needed for multiplayer.
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit disappointed I didn't realize I needed Wii motes to play it on my Wii u. Thanks Nintendo for assuming I buy every one of your consoles. We've only been able to play the single player games, but they're pretty fun. Next time Ill just buy Mario party instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fun with Friends!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game because I heard good things about the gameplay while with friends. It did not disappoint. Gameplay is awesome! I love how interactive and easy it is to get into. The minigames are addictive, we played the Animal Crossing game for hours the other night. Truly a great way to show the innovation of the Wii U and how it can easily bring people together. 5/5 would play again.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shark

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. It has several games. The kids really find this game exciting and fun.
customer_reviews.author: BrwnBaby

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Multiplayer Game
customer_reviews.text: Game came in perfect, new condition. This game sounded cheesy when I first read about it, but it's actually a great multiplayer game. I've set up multiple game nights with my friends and family where we all have a good time playing this game. The game does have some mini-games that can be single player, but the majority of this game relies on you not being a loner. If you want to have a guaranteed good time with some laughs, this game will give it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite Wii U game among the launch titles. Yes the game is comprised of several mini games however all of them are fun. Each mini game also utilizes a feature of the new Wii U controller to show off some of the neat new features that can be fully utilized in the future. Don't be fooled, just because it is several mini games doesn't mean that each game is short. The Metroid and Zelda mini games for example have several levels (Metroid having over 20) that one to five people can play cooperatively. Like most of Nintendo's games this one truly shines with having more people playing together.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves all the games.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of games for the money. I think I counted 12 games listed on the back.
customer_reviews.author: AliceMa

customer_reviews.title: 8year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Son lived this game and worked as expected to with Wii U pad
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Wii U
customer_reviews.text: If you're wondering what Nintendo was thinking when they came out with the Wii U controller, this game explains it. LOTS of mini games to enjoy with friends. I've found that the party game that almost everyone has fun with is the game where you fling ninja stars at the screen using the track pad. People get this immediately and think it's cool. Perhaps it's not as accessible as Wii Bowling, but it'll still impress your friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun "party" style game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun "party" style game... the different activities available are fun, varied, and quick. Not something I would play by myself for extended periods, of course... but the nieces, nephews, and other little ones that come over as well as my friends love playing it and we get lots of laughs.
customer_reviews.author: bluewandersTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great party game for many ages
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son and I enjoy playing many of these games, and several are easy enough that mom (who doesn't play video games) or grandparents can play with and have fun! There are also some games that are tough for him, and for those my brothers and I can hop on and play for hours. Great mix for the whole family, and fun to see our Mii characters dressed up as many classic Nintendo characters!
customer_reviews.author: Claton Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Best Game on WII U
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this game out last summer and we love it. All the kids that visit our family love this game too. The ages range from 4 to 13! It has something for everyone. We play as a family too. We all enjoy this game. In fact, my son broken our first copy and we had to buy a new one. We enjoy playing this one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques A. Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Disc didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The disc did not work. I'm extremely disappointed! The case was in good condition tho.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Adamu

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son...he loves it!!! Highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando F

customer_reviews.title: he loves older games and this was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old, he loves older games and this was perfect
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: I miss my Wii u sometimes
customer_reviews.text: No one plays the Wii u anymore which is sad. This game was really fun for a room full of people
customer_reviews.author: MR A SUKHRAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love Nintendo Land! Played it at a friend's and decided to get a Wii U for my little siblings so they can also enjoy Nintendo Land. The product came quick and I have no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: NkG

customer_reviews.title: a pretty fun game that highlights the ability of the wii ...
customer_reviews.text: a pretty fun game that highlights the ability of the wii u gamepad. the zelda game is my favorite. I wish there were more team based games but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Wesker

customer_reviews.title: A family favorite especially because we can play 5 player at the ...
customer_reviews.text: A family favorite especially because we can play 5 player at the same time. The ghost game is our favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Dutchbaby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun for a group of people
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fun for a group of people, and casually fun for when you wanna kick back with something simple.
customer_reviews.author: Star Zinico Marsh

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and great price, shipping was fast and not a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGrory

customer_reviews.title: The best party game ever made
customer_reviews.text: The title of my review says it all. The Wii U gamepad asymmetrical gameplay makes this one of the most fun family experiences ever created. There are several Co-op, competitive, and solo games to keep everyone in the family having a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Games!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the one game that we play the most on our Wii U as a family. Each mini game is so much fun. Short enough so you don't get bored. We've had many fun nights and laughs over this game. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MsyS23

customer_reviews.title: Lots of games, lots of multiplayer, lots of single player. Perfect for parties.
customer_reviews.text: No brainer to own this game. There are hours of mini games and things to do to get you used to the controls of the Wii U. Excellent value to play time.
customer_reviews.author: Jawabba

customer_reviews.title: SO much FUN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is AMAZING. It's so much fun. Everyone from age 4-32 who've played have loved it! There are lots of mini games so there is something for everyone. I wasn't sure if this game would be a hit, but from the 4 wii u games my kids got for Christmas this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice. several games in one
customer_reviews.text: Several mini games in one. My son loves this, especially the Ghost Mansion and Mario Chase games.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo land is FUN
customer_reviews.text: A must-have for WiiU owners. It has great single player and multiplayer. The games are unique and many: there's a lot to do. The bonus coins for playing games are a little pointless but the whole game is really fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a 7 year old, we all love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a repackage of about a dozen older games for the Wii with a cute amusement park mini-game to tie them all together. We've been playing all the multiplayer games and enjoying ourselves. It is fun for everyone with games that are challenging for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have game for WiiU owners
customer_reviews.text: Take Wii Play, add Nintendo based games, and you have hours of fun for 1 to 5 players. Mind you, not all the games are 5 players, but even just with the ones that are, you can have a ton of fun. This is a must have game for a WiiU owner. You'll have fun playing by yourself or with your friends.
customer_reviews.author: rangerike

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a kid in my church. The smile on his face was priceless. I love shopping with Amazon. It's easy, quick and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: didi1770

customer_reviews.title: A great game to play with a group of friends or ...
customer_reviews.text: A great game to play with a group of friends or a significant other. A great portal for laughs and fun parties.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A taste of everything.
customer_reviews.text: This game contains many famous Nintendo titles all wrapped up in one little convenient package. Not only is it challenging, but the gameplay is longer lasting than many solo titles by other 3rd party publishers! If you are a true Nintendo fan this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great game and fun also
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing this game. Keeps him occupied and happy
customer_reviews.author: Irina Chashkina

customer_reviews.title: Great for groups!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the added 1 vs 4 dynamic. The favorites are where one person is the ghost trying to get everyone else, or when one is mario and the rest are trying to catch him. Way fun!
customer_reviews.author: M Page

customer_reviews.title: 100 % satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: My son is satisfied with the product , it has even increased its attention on the product , I had no problem with the reception of the product
customer_reviews.author: ROMELIA BRINES

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing but fantastic game
customer_reviews.text: Great game for all players. Definitely a must have! This game lightens the mood, mainly because they game has great music and you get to play some old Nintendo games with it. Plus you can play with ur friends if you have some spare wii controllers. Luigi's haunted mansion is my favorite game for multiplayer and donkey kong's crash course is my favorite for single player. This game is well worth it and I think you should definitely purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Peters

customer_reviews.title: fun for all
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's 13th Birthday and he an his friends played this game most of the day and into the night. A lot of fun for the kids but it's Nintendo so what can you expect but good fun games
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Nice use of the Wii U pad and fun for multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying all the attractions in this game. Fun for the whole family. Really uses the wii u pad in lots of unique ways. Wouldn't pay alot for this game, but if you can pick it up for under $20, jump on it
customer_reviews.author: Bridget S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: A ton of fun! Great at parties. One of the best wiiu games I've played to date.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Landings!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. It includes some single player games and some great local multiplayer games. It's like having every great Nintendo franchise rolled into one. I hope they make an update and have it do online multiplayer, it's too good not too!
customer_reviews.author: Dad Paul

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game that really uses the Gamepad and it's fun ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game that really uses the Gamepad and it's fun whether you're playing alone or with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mario Chase is addictive.
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE nintendo land. My family of all ages will gather around and play these mini games, from grandma all the way to the youngest cousin. It's great fun for family and friends and we're addicted to the mario chase. This is by far the BEST wiiU game on the market. They need to make more maps for the multiplayer games!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for kids
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding game for kids. My 5 and 7 year old play this for HOURS, but the entire family can join in as well. Anyone with kids MUST HAVE THIS GAME
customer_reviews.author: Brandi VanLandingham

customer_reviews.title: Great games, not for flying solo.
customer_reviews.text: This game is really ment to have mutiple people playing on it. There are a few games that solo is where it is. But it really takes off when you others playing with you. I wish they would have made it online friendly. Thats why it gets 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charging stand easy to use. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kat whitney

customer_reviews.title: great service very happy thank you
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping, product in perfect condition, thank you, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Paul Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun game that the whole family enjoys. My two little girls love playing this game and it's a great addition to our family gaming library.
customer_reviews.author: Decrepitous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephews were laughing and making so much noise playing this game that I could hear them outside of the house! It's worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: OreoB

customer_reviews.title: just a mii game
customer_reviews.text: a great little game to play , you will need and nun chuck and wii plus control to play all the games ...
customer_reviews.author: robin kay

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: It came with a manual and case In the game works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is so fun
customer_reviews.text: this game broke but then i bought one from amazon and it came like 3 days after and to add it was used and it still worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Michela

customer_reviews.title: Good for a period of about 2 months, alternating weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worth getting secondhand cheap for the period I of time it was popular with my kids (5 year old in particular)
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: My 5 yr old son and I love this game
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old son and I love this game. Some of the mini games we don't care for but the zelda and pikmin ones are addicting. I wish they would make a whole game just like the zelda battle quest.
customer_reviews.author: alisha kelly

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty Fun
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent party game. Don'y buy it thinking that you'll want to play it alone. It's definitely fun if you have friends over though.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Very Addicting.
customer_reviews.text: This game is surprisingly fun and addicting. With a group of people, it becomes very competitive. Loved that it was dropped down to 30 bucks too!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Fun Times
customer_reviews.text: Like most Nintendo games, this is entertaining for kids and young at heart adults. It is definitely light entertainment of the arcade variety.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cain

customer_reviews.title: So good I got it twice
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun for my family that after my kids accidentally broke the disc, I bought it again. Happiness=Priceless
customer_reviews.author: ZaZaZa

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: We hadn't bought the wii that came with this and I wasn't paying $60 to get it. This was a great price after waiting to get it. The kids and I have really enjoyed all the games.
customer_reviews.author: froggymama

customer_reviews.title: best party game ever
customer_reviews.text: best party game ever, my kids like it, my parents like it, i like it, that's all you can ask for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game that the kids won't get tired of quickly.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my sons for Christmas. They have loved playing it. There are parts of the game that are single player, and lots that are multi-player. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: hendermc

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I play Nintendo with a 5 year old & we both love this game. It is hours of fun & leads to interesting conversations!
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: NINTENDO ACES IT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: my wife loves the mini games keeps us busy for hours on end
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. It's a bunch of mini-games. I spent most of my time on the Zelda one.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: The new Wii U is very different from the first. This game has many levels of enjoyment. Am still learning them. More buttons than I know what to do with
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Best WiiU title
customer_reviews.text: So far it's the only game worth buying for the WiiU. Amazon has he best price, half of hat of retail. Game is great for every age. My 3 1/2 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ursula

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!
customer_reviews.text: love love love this game that much is an awesome game hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Fun time in nintenoland!
customer_reviews.text: Have a blast in a whole new way. Nintendoland has many differn't fun attractions. My favorite is Mario chase it's like a virtual hide and seek game!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Nader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exact replacement for the original that came with the WII U. I broke the original removing from the DVD case.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dial

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and family play
customer_reviews.text: Our kids as well as the neighbor kids love it. It's quick and fast moving. They can play a few levels and then break to run outside and come back to it. Lots of mini games and levels, that keep short attention spans.
customer_reviews.author: gjgahan

customer_reviews.title: Just What I ordered
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for his birthday. It got here in great time and was just what he wanted. He had a great Birthday!
customer_reviews.author: bonbon

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! It's a lot of fun with you compete against each other. I wish there were a few more competition games, however.
customer_reviews.author: R Stretta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. I got it for my brother, he loves it more.
customer_reviews.author: Addictedtochoco

customer_reviews.title: Boys Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is another fun family game for wii u. The whole family can join in. I like that there are lots of mini game options.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Game received is not working
customer_reviews.text: Bought used in acceptable condition from the amazon warehouse and the game received is not working !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great game. I would like to see more minigames, though.
customer_reviews.author: William Charpentier

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Child loved it, I love it. Would suggest game to everyone. Service was one time. If you have a Wii U this is a must get.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee Piety

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Land
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas and he loves it. He has had a great time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this game. I find many of the games fun as well. It is a very good game for families.
customer_reviews.author: Shoff-STL

customer_reviews.title: Works great, No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Game played great, disc had no stratches, a steal for little over $15. Came with original case it had a few dings but barely noticable. Had no Club Nintendo code inside but that is to be expected when purchasing used.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Leader Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game, but it will get stale after a while. It is a game of mini-games.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves playing it. It came when expected and everything was as it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shreck

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: We are big Nintendo fans at our house and we love playing NintendoLand. It's the best with a large group of people.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rotar

customer_reviews.title: Lots of entertainment for the family
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment of games for the family to play together or alone! need more words to complete this review.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Family and individual fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great to play indivually and/or with family. I highly suggest purchasing wii motes so everyone can enjoy the experience together. Playing with family and being competitive on this game creates bonding moments.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This game was perfect for my family of 5. Loads of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Land is Another Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I normally love all the games I buy (because I'm picky), and Nintendo Land definitely met my expectations. It has games for easy gamers, casual gamers, and hardcore gamers! Metroid & Mario Chase game are personally some of my favorites. I recommend this game to anyone looking to buy a game for the Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Tan

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and fun minigames.
customer_reviews.text: More than just minigames and a VERY good value for your money. It shows what the gamepad is all about and is a very important game.
customer_reviews.author: KungFuTheater

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: It is nintendo. Nothing wrong... just nothing really special either. Fun with friends, and extremely fun while intoxicated. A game to play with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Tyler's game
customer_reviews.text: I don't play with the video games, however my son seems to enjoy this game. One of the many games to occupy him during his summer vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Packed with content! All the games are more fun than you could think! The gamepad really shines in there and there are amazing games to play with your family and friends! Not only that, for it is also a hardcore experience as well!
customer_reviews.author: Simon Fortier Drouin

product_meta.title: Nintendo Land
product_meta.description:
Experience Nintendo's greatest game worlds in one giant theme park! Nintendo Land is a fun and lively virtual theme park filled with attractions based on popular Nintendo game worlds. Each attraction features unique and innovative gameplay experiences made possible by the Wii U GamePad controller. Depending on the attraction, players can play solo, compete against other players, or even team up to play cooperatively. Up to five players can participate in dynamic multiplayer modes in select attractions. The experiences change depending on whether players are using the GamePad, a Wii Remote controller, or just watching others play on the TV screen. Multiplayer modes require additional accessories required, which are sold separately.

AMAZON.COM


 Nintendo Land is a mini-game compilation specifically for play on Nintendo's Wii U game console (sold separately). The compilation releases concurrently with the Wii U console, and features 12 Nintendo franchise themed games, referred to as "attractions." These are set in an interactive theme park environment, and are designed to highlight the functionality of the new console. Additional features include: multiplayer support up to five players in select mini-games, support of Wii Remotes and Wii Remote Plus controllers, and familiar and expanded Nintendo Mii functionality. 

Explore 12 gameworlds of the Nintendo universe in a single theme park environment in Nintendo Land.
View larger NINTENDO'S GREATEST GAME WORLDS IN ONE GIANT THEME PARK 
 Nintendo Land is a fun and lively virtual theme park filled with attractions based on popular Nintendo game worlds. Each attraction features unique and innovative gameplay experiences made possible by the Wii U GamePad controller. Depending on the attraction, players can choose to play solo, compete against other players, or even team up to play cooperatively. Up to five players can participate in dynamic multiplayer modes in select attractions. The experiences change depending on whether players are using the Wii U GamePad, a Wii Remote controller or just watching others play on the TV screen. However you choose to play, a whole new realm of fun awaits on the Wii U with Nintendo Land. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * Nintendo Land features fun-filled theme park attractions based on Nintendo's greatest game worlds, including Mario Chase, The Legend of Zelda: Battle Quest, Pikmin Adventure and more. There are 12 attractions in all.
 * Different activities take advantage of the second screen of the new Wii U Gamepad controller in different ways. For example, simply slide a finger across the touch screen to seamlessly fire ninja stars in the action-based Takamaru's Ninja Castle. In Donkey Kong's Crash Course, tilt the GamePad left and right to safely navigate an elaborate obstacle course.
 * Dynamic multiplayer that offers different experiences in the same game. Even in the same attraction, the player using the GamePad will have a completely different experience than players using the TV: In Luigi's Ghost Mansion, the player using the GamePad is able to control a ghost invisible to players using the TV. In Metroid Blast, the player with the GamePad controls an aerial gunship versus the ground-based players using the TV.
 * The attractions are easy to pick up and play, but also contains deeper levels of play that are sure to challenge even the most experienced gamers. Metroid Blast, for example, contains a deep mission mode as well as a competitive surface-air combat mode.
 * Attractions are grouped into three types:  * Team Attractions like Metroid Blast and The Legend of Zelda: Battle Quest that offer depth and challenge for 1 to 5 players.
    * Competitive Attractions like Mario Chase and Animal Crossing: Sweet Day where 2 to 5 players compete against each other.
    * Solo Attractions like Takamaru's Ninja Castle, Donkey Kong's Crash Course and Balloon Trip Breeze, that offer simple but fun and engaging play for one player.
   
   
 * Each attraction has multiple fun challenges designed to keep visitors coming back for more. Players will receive stamps upon completing special challenges.
 * The game includes Miiverse functionality to maximize customization and fun (broadband Internet access required).

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
Supports up to 5 players.
View larger Fun Miiverse functionality.
View larger Crisp Wii U HD graphics.
View larger Gamepad touch play options.
View larger
